short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create and customize step-by-step directions for any website to help your audience understand the product better.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What can you do with the Demos.page Chrome Extension:

Once you have installed the Demos.page Chrome extension, you can start capturing the required steps on the required web page by just clicking on the "Start Capture" button. Demos.page will capture your screen with the clicks you make.
You can Restart, Delete, Pause, and Resume the steps that you have captured at any time.
With Demos.page, you have the advantage of switching between various tabs to capture steps on other pages altogether.
You get the URL of the web page that you are capturing as step 1, which makes it much easier to understand the steps.
Demos.page offers the option of editing all the captured steps after being redirected to the editing page once completed capturing.
On the editing page, you can preview all the changes that you want to make to your captured steps. On the player by clicking on the "View It" button, you can manually view all the captured steps. By clicking on the "Try It" button, you can see the automated steps that you have captured. By clicking on the "Watch It" button, you can see all the steps that you have created and edit them. By clicking on the "New Out" button, you can see all the steps like a walkthrough.
With the "Brand Kit" option you can customize the details of your captured steps like, the front cover, back cover, button color, font styles, and much more.
You can share your video documentation after completing all the necessary edits as a link to anybody, anywhere, and at any time. You can also copy the "Embed" link and run it on any website and anywhere you want.

Some Use Cases for the Demos.page Chrome Extension:
1. Onboarding and Training:
The Demos.page Chrome Extension can help new employees understand how to complete specific tasks and procedures within a company. This can help streamline the onboarding process and ensure consistency in training.
2. Software Development:
The Demos.page Chrome extension can be useful for software development teams to document and share the steps to reproduce a bug or error, making it easier for team members to identify the issue and fix it quickly.
3. Customer Support:
The Demos.page Chrome Extension is particularly useful in providing customer support by recording the steps to solve common issues and providing a video tutorial for customers to follow. This can help reduce the number of support tickets and improve customer satisfaction.
4. Sales and Marketing:
For sales and marketing teams, video documentation can be used to demonstrate the features and functionality of a product or service. The videos can be used in presentations, on websites, and during client demonstrations to showcase the unique selling points of a product or service.
5. E-learning:
A teacher or instructor can use the Demos.page Extension to record educational content, which can serve as an aid to students in revising lessons or in understanding complex topics. This can help students to grasp the concept more easily and quickly, thus improving their grades and reducing learning time.
